title: Covid-19 Cluster: 25 more tested positive
content: 25 more persons tested positive for Covid-19, confirmed the Department of Government Information.Among them, 18 are associates of Peliyagoda Covid-19 Cluster and 07 are prisoners.Â The total of 122 cases reported today (04) so far.            The total number of confirmed cases rises to 88 547 from Covid-19 Clusters.
